title: mlos_bench SSH Host and Fileshare Service config
description: config for an mlos_bench SSH Host and Fileshare Service

requestTimeout.description: Request timeout in seconds, or null to disable timeout.

ssh_port.description: Default port to use when connecting to the remote machine(s).

ssh_username.description: Default username to use when connecting to the remote machine(s). If null or unspecified, will default to the value in ~/.ssh/config or the current user if not provided in another config.

priv_key_path.$comment: TODO: add support for multiple private keys or dynamically fetched private keys.
priv_key_path.description: Path to the private key to use when connecting to the remote machine(s). Note: these should be passwordless or else an ssh-agent should be available via the SSH_AUTH_SOCK environment variable.

known_hosts_path.description: Path to known_hosts file. Set to null to disable host key checking.
